name: MyADDA
0:
”Alexa, open My ADDA”
”Alexa, ask My ADDA for dues”
”Alexa, ask My ADDA for expected visitors”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my adda
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Living in an Apartment or Condo? 

Want to know which visitors are expected to your home today? Or do you quickly want to check on the dues to your Association?

Is it some emergency, where you want to raise an alarm with your Security or Front Desk, so that someone can rush to your Apartment / Condo?

Simply ask My ADDA through your Alexa device!

ADDA is the ONE software which caters to all requirements of Apartment Owners/Residents around their home & community.

ADDA is a private social network, it’s a payment App for making payments to Association, it’s a tool for raising complaints and queries. It can be used by Owners and Tenants for facility booking, managing visitors, for viewing and posting classifieds, and so much more. 

Check out more about ADDA here: https://adda.io/
